bibl.title: On the Nature of P. Petrie I iii 1: Gnomologium or Work about Plagiarism?
bibl.note: Pack2 1572. Defence of a true gnomological character of P. Petrie I iii 1, which is not a fragment of an ancient work "peri klopon", as S.R. Slings recently proposed [ZPE 33 (1979) pp. 41-45].
bibl.seg: Carrara Paolo, On the Nature of P. Petrie I iii 1: Gnomologium or Work about Plagiarism?
Pack2 1572. Defence of a true gnomological character of P. Petrie I iii 1, which is not a fragment of an ancient work "peri klopon", as S.R. Slings recently proposed [ZPE 33 (1979) pp. 41-45].
